seg.source: “但是购买了小区车位的个别业主，怕这样做会影响自己的车位出租价格，也怀疑其他人存有私心，所以一直背后搞破坏，导致车位改造一事被搁置。”
seg.translation: “However, business owners who have purchased parking spaces in the community worry that this will affect the lease of their parking space, and suspect that there are others harboring ulterior motives and kept sabotaging this behind their backs and delaying the project for renovating the parking lot.”

"But the individual owners who bought the community parking spaces, fearing that this would affect their own rental prices, also suspected that others have selfish motives, so has been behind the destruction, leading to the renovation of the parking lot is shelved." ”

"However, individual owners who have purchased a space in a residential area, fearing that doing so would affect the rental price of their own space and suspecting that others are selfish, have been behind the vandalism, resulting in the parking space conversion being put on hold," he said.
